message:
حاولت افهم ... بس اتلخبطت اكتر
فأتمنى لو تشرحولي الفرق بين:
Software architect 
Development manager
Development team leader
Scrum master

ومين احسن حد ممكن يبقى شريك في ستارت اب ويقدر ينفذ المشروع (ويب او موبايل) بالكامل عن طريق انه يقسم الشغل حسب التكنولوجي المناسبة على فريلانسرز بالتوازي ويستلم منهم ويركب الكود على بعضه ويشغل المشروع بقى ويستمر في تطويره واصلاح المشاكل؟

data.message:
Software Architect : is responsible for insuring that the solution is done in an optimum way where its well organized and scalelable and maintainable.
Development Manager : He can do the architect as well and this is a managerial position where he is responsible for all of the resources and the whole software life cycle.
Development Team Leader : He is the SPOC "Single Point of Contact" of the team and the most experienced person of the team and he is responsible for handling the team tasks and manage the team coach them and decide the critical decisions.
Scrum Master : The one who has the agility mindset and apply it using scrum framework, a developer can be scrum master and it is about following some flexible rules to meet the deadlines with the maximum possible satisfaction of a customer.

P.S This is a shallow explanation you may need to read about each one for deep understanding.
